# Company Pages Configuration

> **Not configured.** Run `linkedin-onboarding` to set up your company pages.

This file is generated by the onboarding skill. It defines your LinkedIn company pages for automated posting.

## Expected Format (Generated by Onboarding)

```
### Page 1: [Company Name]
- **LinkedIn Page ID:** [numeric ID]
- **URL Slug:** [company-slug]
- **Focus Area:** [e.g., Product updates, Industry insights]
- **Content Pillars:** [e.g., Innovation, Customer stories, Thought leadership]
- **Tone:** [e.g., Professional, Conversational]

### Page 2: [Company Name]
...
```

## How to Configure

1. Run `linkedin-onboarding` and answer Q15 (Company Pages)
2. Or manually edit this file following the format above

## Admin URL Pattern

Once configured, admin URLs are constructed as:
```
https://www.linkedin.com/company/{url-slug}/admin/page-posts/published/
```
